${ModID}:MessUp.NAME: Mess Up
${ModID}:MessUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the amount of cards in your 抽牌堆。 NL Shuffle your 弃牌堆 into your 抽牌堆。
${ModID}:MessUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your 弃牌堆 into your deck. NL Deal damage equal to the amount of cards in your 抽牌堆。

${ModID}:PlannedDefense.NAME: Planned Defense
${ModID}:PlannedDefense.DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 If you played another Innate card 本回合, also 获得 half that much Block next turn.

${ModID}:SecondStrike.NAME: Second Strike
${ModID}:SecondStrike.DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 保留 。 NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 If it is not the first turn, deal !D! damage a获得.

${ModID}:DashIn.NAME: Dash In
${ModID}:DashIn.DESCRIPTION: Innate NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies X times.
${ModID}:DashIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies X+1 times.

${ModID}:InstinctiveThinking.NAME: Instinctive Thinking
${ModID}:InstinctiveThinking.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, if the first card you play is Innate, 获得 !M! 点 格挡 。

${ModID}:Cross.NAME: Cross
${ModID}:Cross.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Your *Crosses deal 1 more damage 本场战斗. Shuffle a *Cross into your 抽牌堆。
${ModID}:Cross.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL Deal !D! damage twice. Your *Crosses deal 1 more damage 本场战斗. Shuffle a *Cross+ into your 抽牌堆。

${ModID}:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
${ModID}:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 Discard all Innate cards in your hand. If you do, next turn, your Attacks deal double damage
${ModID}:Improvise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 Discard all Innate cards in your hand. If you do, next turn, your Attacks deal double damage

${ModID}:Debut.NAME: Debut
${ModID}:Debut.DESCRIPTION: Once each turn, playing an Innate card Refunds 1.
${ModID}:Debut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL Once each turn, playing an Innate card Refunds 1.

${ModID}:BattlePrep.NAME: Battle Prep
${ModID}:BattlePrep.DESCRIPTION: Choose 一张牌 in your hand and permanently give it 固有 。 Remove this from your deck, permanently.
${ModID}:BattlePrep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 保留 。 NL Choose 一张牌 in your hand and permanently give it 固有 。 Remove this from your deck, permanently.

${ModID}:Surge.NAME: Surge
${ModID}:Surge.DESCRIPTION: 本回合, your next Innate card is played twice.
${ModID}:Surge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL 本回合, your next Innate card is played twice.
